title.en: Prismatic Convergence: The Spectrum of Light

description.ko: 수정 프리즘을 통해 흰색 빛이 생생한 무지개로 갈라지는 매혹적인 탐구로, 초현실적이고 고화질의 미학으로 굴절의 물리학을 담아냈습니다.
description.en: A mesmerizing exploration of white light splitting into vibrant rainbows through a crystalline prism, capturing the physics of refraction in a surreal, high-definition aesthetic.

prompt: Macro photography of a sleek glass prism on a dark reflective surface, a single beam of intense white light entering and dispersing into a brilliant, sharp spectrum of colors, caustic light patterns, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, hyper-realistic, chromatic aberration.
